com.facebook.buck.apple.simulator

Class AppleSimulatorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.apple.simulator.AppleSimulatorController

  • public class AppleSimulatorController
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to manage starting the iOS simulator as well as installing and running applications inside it.

    • Method Detail

      • startSimulator

        public Optional<java.lang.Long> startSimulator(java.lang.String simulatorUdid,
                                      long timeoutMillis)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Starts up the iOS simulator, blocking the calling thread until the simulator boots or timeoutMillis passes, whichever happens first. Call canStartSimulator(String) before invoking this method to ensure the simulator can be started.
        Returns:
        The number of milliseconds waited if the simulator booted successfully, Optional.absent() otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • canStartSimulator

        Throws:

      • waitForSimulatorsToShutdown

        public Optional<java.lang.Long> waitForSimulatorsToShutdown(long timeoutMillis)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        Waits up to timeoutMillis for all simulators to shut down.
        Returns:
        The number of milliseconds waited if all simulators have shut down, Optional.absent() otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • waitForSimulatorToBoot

        public Optional<java.lang.Long> waitForSimulatorToBoot(long timeoutMillis,
                                              java.lang.String simulatorUdid)
                                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        Waits up to timeoutMillis for the specified simulator to boot.
        Returns:
        The number of milliseconds waited if the specified simulator booted, Optional.absent() otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • installBundleInSimulator

        public boolean installBundleInSimulator(java.lang.String simulatorUdid,
                               java.nio.file.Path bundlePath)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        Installs a bundle in a previously-started simulator.
        Returns:
        true if the bundle was installed, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • launchInstalledBundleInSimulator

        public Optional<java.lang.Long> launchInstalledBundleInSimulator(java.lang.String simulatorUdid,
                                                        java.lang.String bundleID,
                                                        AppleSimulatorController.LaunchBehavior launchBehavior,
                                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> args)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        Launches a previously-installed bundle in a started simulator.
        Returns:
        the process ID of the newly-launched process if successful, an absent value otherwise.
